com.datecs.linea

Class LineaPro

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datecs.linea.LineaPro

  • public class LineaPro
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements support for LineaPro devices.

    All methods are internally synchronized with instance of current object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LineaPro.BarcodeListener
      Interface definition for Barcode event callback.

      Battery information.
      static interface  LineaPro.ButtonListener
      Interface definition for button event callback.
      static interface  LineaPro.ConnectionListener
      Interface definition for a Printer event callback.

      • beep

        public void beep(int volume,
        int[] pattern)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 LineaProException
        Play sounds on device speaker.

        The sounds are played in background.

        Maximum 10 sounds can be set at once.

        Parameters:
        volume - the volume in percents.
        pattern - the array that contains patterns of frequency(Hz) and duration (milliseconds).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.

      • beep

        public void beep(int volume,
        int frequency,
        int duration)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 LineaProException
        Play sounds on device speaker.

        The sounds are played in background.

        Parameters:
        volume - the volume in percents.
        frequency - the sound frequency in Hertz.
        duration - the sound duration in Milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.

        Parameters:

      • fwStart

        public void fwStart()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    LineaProException
        Start firmware update.

        For AM devices authentication is need.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.

      • fwErase

        public void fwErase()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    LineaProException
        Erase current firmware.

        This command can be executed only if start firmware update is executed.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.

      • fwWrite

        public void fwWrite(int address,
           byte[] data)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    LineaProException
        Write firmware chunk.

        This command can be executed only if start firmware update is executed.

        Parameters:
        address - the address to write data.
        data - the data chunk. The data size can be maximum of 2044 bytes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.

      • fwStop

        public void fwStop()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   LineaProException
        End firmware update.

        This command can be executed only if start firmware update is executed.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.

      • fwUpdate

        public void fwUpdate(byte[] data)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     LineaProException
        Update firmware.
        Parameters:
        data - the firmware data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        LineaProException - if LineaPro error occurs.
